mapper.sql: SELECT g.* FROM base_data_product AS g LEFT JOIN base_data_product_brand AS b ON b.id = g.brand_id LEFT JOIN base_data_product_category AS c ON c.id = g.category_id LEFT JOIN recursion_mapping AS rm ON rm.node_id = g.category_id and rm.node_type = 2
mapper.select: SELECT p.id FROM base_data_product AS p LEFT JOIN base_data_product_property_relation AS pr ON p.id = pr.product_id AND pr.property_id = #{propertyId} WHERE pr.product_id IS NULL
